title: Instagram and YouTube star Victoria Magrath of In The Frow: 'I shared my wedding with 800,000 people'
text:
When 30-year-old Victoria Magrath from Wigan got engaged in August 2018, she naturally wanted to tell everyone. But everyone, for her, wasn’t just a ring-around to family, or updating her relationship status for friends to see on Facebook. As one of the UK’s most successful fashion bloggers and influencers, her ‘everyone’ includes more than 880,000 Instagram followers, with whom she shared every moment of the proposal.

Victoria leads a fantasy lifestyle and gets to call it work. Via her blog, In The Frow, a YouTube channel, book and multiple social media accounts, she has created an addictive media brand based on being the most fabulous version of herself. Every element of her life has become...
description: When 30-year-old Victoria Magrath from Wigan got engaged in August 2018, she naturally wanted to tell everyone.
